# Characteristic Properties

**API Collection**

The properties that characteristics can have.

## Overview

Check to see if a characteristic’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCharacteristic/properties] array contains any of these constants to learn something about the corresponding characteristic ([doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCharacteristic]).

## Properties of Characteristics

- **HMCharacteristicPropertyReadable**: The characteristic is readable.
- **HMCharacteristicPropertyWritable**: The characteristic is writable.
- **HMCharacteristicPropertyHidden**: The characteristic should be hidden from the user.

## Reading characteristic properties

- **properties**: An array of properties that describe the characteristic.
